description:
Workflow triggers are events that cause a workflow to run.

This event with trigger workflow on a push event.

attributes.name: branches
attributes.description: Select branch name on push event.

description:
Workflow triggers are events that cause a workflow to run.

This event with trigger workflow on a pull request event.

attributes.name: types
attributes.description: Runs your workflow when activity on a pull request in the workflow's repository occurs.
